# Backend Services

## Type
API and data services layer

## Status
Initial setup - technology stack to be determined

## Planned Components
- RESTful API endpoints
- Database integration
- Authentication/authorization
- Business logic layer
- Data processing services

## Database
Database type and schema to be determined based on requirements

## Development Environment
Setup instructions will be added once tech stack is chosen

## Deployment
Deployment configuration and procedures will be documented once infrastructure is determined
